Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at TRH Torrenova in Calvia (Magaluf), you'll be convenient to Palma Nova Beach and Pirates Adventure Show. This eco-friendly aparthotel is within close proximity of Golf Fantasia and Western Water Park.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 199 air-conditioned rooms featuring kitchenettes. Rooms have private balconies. Satellite television is provided for your entertainment. Conveniences include refrigerators and sofa beds, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take advantage of recreation opportunities including an outdoor pool and a sauna. This aparthotel also features an arcade/game room, a television in the lobby, and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
You can enjoy a meal at a restaurant serving the guests of TRH Torrenova, or stop in at a snack bar/deli. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar. Breakfast is available for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include high-speed (wired) Internet access (surcharge), a 24-hour front desk, and multilingual staff.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
You can enjoy a meal at a restaurant serving the guests of TRH Torrenova, or stop in at a snack bar/deli. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar. Breakfast is available for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Palma Nova Beach - 1.2 km / 0.8 mi
Pirates Adventure Show - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Golf Fantasia - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Western Water Park - 2.2 km / 1.4 mi
Poniente Golf Club - 2.8 km / 1.7 mi
Marineland Mallorca - 3.1 km / 1.9 mi
Puerto Portals Marina - 3.1 km / 1.9 mi
Mago Beach - 4.3 km / 2.7 mi
Real Golf Bendinat - 5.5 km / 3.4 mi
Santa Ponsa Beach - 5.5 km / 3.4 mi
Port of Adriano - 6 km / 3.7 mi
Cala Mayor Beach - 7.1 km / 4.4 mi
Marivent Palace - 7.3 km / 4.6 mi
San Carlos Castle - 7.9 km / 4.9 mi
Mallorca Casino - 8.1 km / 5 mi

The preferred airport for TRH Torrenova is Palma de Mallorca (PMI) - 16.6 km / 10.3 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
